name: Stellar Blast
description:
The game might take 2 minutes to load on the first time

This is a space shoot 'em up game, where you are going to face an army of spaceships, with 2 different weapons and multiple upgrades.

Instructions:
  • Mouse - control the ship
  • Left-Click - shoot
  • Mouse wheel - change weapons
  • Esc - Open menu

          Destroy the tanks to get upgrades and prepare yourself to the boss.

Credits:

Programming and Game Design:

    Gustavo Oliveira de Carvalho [https://www.behance.net/gumegasonic]

Game Design:
